summary: This bill, the Strengthening Support for American Manufacturing Act, mandates the Secretary of Commerce to assess the Department of Commerce's programs related to supply chain resilience and manufacturing/industrial innovation. The Secretary must identify relevant offices and bureaus, evaluate their effectiveness, and provide recommendations to enhance their efficiency and impact. The report will be produced with the help of the National Academy of Public Administration and submitted to the appropriate congressional committees, along with proposed legislative actions and the Secretary's response.
